section.title: Dashboard
section.para: onCourse now has a new dashboard which you can access from the File menu. It is still in beta so let us know how it works for you. It includes some new features:

listitem.para: Smart search across many entities in one go
Customise your list of frequently used parts of onCourse
An easier to use way to find parts of onCourse you need to use
